description: Students develop and complete individual projects in fiction, deepening and polishing their work. Class sessions are devoted to discussion of craft, examination of literary models, and workshopping of student writing. Prerequisite: Approval of portfolio by department committee.
name: Adv Fict Wrtg Wkshp
prerequisites: Approval of portfolio by department committee.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Approval of portfolio by department committee.

title: Advanced Fiction Writing Workshop
